trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Web.UI" /> namespace provides classes and interfaces that enable you to create ASP.NET server controls and ASP.NET Web pages for the user interface of your ASP.NET Web applications.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="N:System.Web.UI" /> 命名空間提供類別和介面，可讓您建立 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項和 ASP.NET Web 網頁，以做為 ASP.NET Web 應用程式的使用者介面。

trans-unit.source: This namespace includes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class, which provides a common set of functionality for all server controls, which includes HTML server controls, Web server controls, and user controls.
trans-unit.target: 此命名空間包含<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>類別，可提供一組常用功能的所有伺服器控制項，其中包含 HTML 伺服器控制項，Web 伺服器控制項和使用者控制項。

trans-unit.source: This class is generated automatically whenever a request is made for an .aspx file in an ASP.NET Web application.
trans-unit.target: 每當針對.aspx 檔案中的 ASP.NET Web 應用程式提出要求時，會自動產生這個類別。

trans-unit.source: You can inherit from both of these classes.
trans-unit.target: 您可以繼承自兩個類別。

trans-unit.source: The namespace also includes classes that provide the server controls with data-binding functionality, the ability to save the view state of a given control or page, and parsing functionality.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間也包含伺服器控制項提供資料繫結的功能、 儲存檢視狀態的指定之控制項或頁面上，以及剖析功能的類別。
